email_subject: TECH ALERT: Amazon Loss Narrows, Compaq Swings to Loss
email_body: TECHNOLOGY ALERT from The Wall Street Journal Oct. 23, 2001 Amazon.com reported a narrower third-quarter loss that matched analyst expectations, amid weak growth in revenue. The online retailer stuck with its profitability target. Compaq swung to a wider-than-expected loss in the third quarter on a 33% drop in revenue amid shipment problems and slack demand for computers.
